name: Phantom Fall
description:
The web browser version is known to have issues with audio.
We recommend the downloadable Windows, macOS, and Linux versions!

ALL assets (art, animation, code, design, audio, etc.) were made during the duration of the Game Dev Network Jam 2021 (9 days). 🎮 THE GAME

"Phantom Fall" is a vertical-scrolling endless runner game that can be played on the Web, Windows, macOS, or Linux.

Theme: Rebirth

Story: Cain's revival in the underworld is dependent on how well you navigate the depths of this spooky land of the dead. Maneuver around the world, defeat the creatures that creep on the surface, and consume their souls to be reborn with their power! ✨ Warning: The handy death wave doesn't take too kindly towards beings that wish to relive 

🕹️ GAME MECHANICS Keyboard Controls 🔥 Arrow keys - move / aim 🔥 Z - jump 🔥 X - attack 🔥 C - special power (after retrieving soul) Controller Buttons 🍊 Left Control Stick - move / aim 🍊 Down Button - jump 🍊 Right Button - attack 🍊 left Button - special power (after retrieving soul) 📝 TEAM
